description:
Before installing on Win2008 run Powershell.exe and then "Set-ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned"!

The only real alternative to IIS, UWS is a redistributable web server for Windows that can packaged with your ASP.NET web application and installed on your customers' systems along with your web app or site, free of charge. 

What's There:
- Support of ASP.NET 4.x, 3.x, 2.0 and 1.1.
- Use InstallShield, Advanced Installer or Visual Studio 2010, 2008 or 2005 Setup project.
- User-friendly "UWS Explorer" - our site/app management console.
- .NET and COM application management APIs.
- Ability to run applications as 32 bit on 64-bit systems.
- Support of SSL.
- Runs as a service, intractive program or Visual Studio interal debug web server.
- Support of virtual directories.
- TCP port sharing.
- Windows authentication.
- Response content GZIP compression.
releaseNotes:
Change log, release notes and known bugs are at:
http://ultidev.com/Forums/yaf_postsm2882.aspx
summary: UWS is an advanced, SSL-enabled, *redistributable* Web Server for ASP.NET applications.
title: UltiDev Web Server Pro (UWS)
